Hero.title: Open Source Ethiopian Bible Project
Hero.description: Explore the Ethiopian Bible's heritage. Dive into scriptures and connect with your faith.

appCard.mobileDescription: Read the Ethiopian bible, explore plans, and seek God every day.

hero.description: The Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church (EOTC) preserves one of the most ancient and complete biblical canons globally. Written in Ge'ez, Ethiopia's classical language, it reflects a living tradition that has been faithfully maintained for centuries.

cards.title: 81 Canonical Books
cards.description: The EOTC Bible has the largest biblical canon in Christianity, containing 81 books compared to the 66 found in most Western Bibles.

cards.title: Unique Scriptures
cards.description: Includes texts not found elsewhere, such as the Book of Enoch, Jubilees, Sirach (Ecclesiasticus), and more.

cards.title: Shared Heritage
cards.description: Respected by the Ethiopian and Eritrean Orthodox Churches, as it continues to guide worship and tradition.

DownloadApp.title: Download the EOTCBible App Now!
DownloadApp.description: Explore your spiritual journey and engage with scriptures. Discover insights that resonate with your faith and connect deeply with teachings that have shaped beliefs.

KeyFeatures.sectionTitle: Key Features of the EOTCBible Application

feature1.title: Highlight, Bookmark & Share
feature1.description: Mark verses that resonate with you. Highlight passages, add bookmarks, and easily share scripture with friends on social media or messaging apps.

feature2.title: Bible Reading Plans
feature2.description: Stay consistent with guided reading plans. Choose from themes, set durations, or create your own plan to strengthen your spiritual journey.

feature3.title: Sync Progress Across Devices
feature3.description: Seamlessly continue your Bible study across multiple devices. Your highlights, notes, and progress automatically stay in sync.

feature4.title: Offline Access
feature4.description: Access the Bible anywhere, even without the internet. Download versions for offline reading—perfect for traveling, commuting, or remote areas.

feature5.title: Gentle Reminders
feature5.description: Stay engaged with customizable notifications that encourage you to read at your preferred time every day.

feature6.title: Notes & Reflections
feature6.description: Write down your insights and reflections while studying scripture. Keep them organized like a personal spiritual journal within the app.
